org.finra.herd.rest

Class JobRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.rest.HerdBaseController
      • org.finra.herd.rest.JobRestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/rest",
                produces={"application/xml","application/json"})
public class JobRestController
extends HerdBaseController
    The REST controller that handles job REST requests.

    • Method Detail

      • createJob

        @RequestMapping(value="/jobs",
                method=POST,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_JOBS_POST")
public Job createJob(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                  JobCreateRequest request)
                                                                                                                                                                           throws Exception
        Creates and starts a new job asynchronously.

        Requires EXECUTE permission on namespace

        Parameters:
        request - the information needed to create the job.
        Returns:
        the created job information.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getJobs

        @RequestMapping(value="/jobs",
                method=GET)
 @Secured(value="FN_JOBS_GET")
public JobSummaries getJobs(@RequestParam(value="namespace",required=false)
                                                                                                                      String namespace,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="jobName",required=false)
                                                                                                                      String jobName,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="status",required=false)
                                                                                                                      JobStatusEnum status,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="startTime",required=false)
                                                                                                                      String startTime,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="endTime",required=false)
                                                                                                                      String endTime)
                                                                                                               throws Exception

        Gets a list of job executions based on the specified filter parameters.

        Jobs' namespace to which you do not have READ permissions to will be omitted from the result.

        Parameters:
        namespace - an optional namespace filter
        jobName - an optional job name filter
        status - an optional job status filter
        startTime - an optional start time filter (ex. 2015, 2015-12, 2015-12-28, 2015-12-12T3:4:5)
        endTime - an optional end time filter (ex. 2015, 2015-12, 2015-12-28, 2015-12-12T3:4:5)
        Returns:
        the list of job summaries.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any problems were encountered.

      • getJob

        @RequestMapping(value="/jobs/ids/{id}",
                method=GET)
 @Secured(value="FN_JOBS_GET_BY_ID")
public Job getJob(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                           String id,
                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="verbose",required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                           Boolean verbose)
                                                                                                                    throws Exception
        Gets the details of a previously submitted job.

        Requires READ permission on namespace

        Parameters:
        id - the job id.
        Returns:
        the job information.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • signalJob

        @RequestMapping(value="/jobs/signal",
                method=POST,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_JOBS_SIGNAL_POST")
public Job signalJob(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                JobSignalRequest request)
                                                                                                                                                                                         throws Exception
        Signals the job with the receive task.

        Requires EXECUTE permission on namespace

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the created job information.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • updateJob

        @RequestMapping(value="/jobs/ids/{id}",
                method=PUT,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_JOBS_PUT")
public Job updateJob(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                         String id,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                         JobUpdateRequest jobUpdateRequest)
                                                                                                                                                                                  throws Exception
        Activates or suspends a job execution.

        Requires EXECUTE permission on namespace

        Parameters:
        id - the job id
        jobUpdateRequest - the job update request
        Returns:
        the job
        Throws:
        Exception - when any exception occurs

      • deleteJob

        @RequestMapping(value="/jobs/ids/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
 @Secured(value="FN_JOBS_DELETE")
public Job deleteJob(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                              String id,
                                                                                                                              @RequestBody
                                                                                                                              JobDeleteRequest jobDeleteRequest)
                                                                                                                       throws Exception
        Deletes a currently running job and preserves the job state in history.

        Requires EXECUTE permission on namespace

        Parameters:
        id - The job id
        jobDeleteRequest - The delete request
        Returns:
        The job that has been deleted
        Throws:
        Exception - when any exception occurs
